movies.Title: The Avengers
movies.Writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movies.Plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 34 wins & 75 nominations.

movies.Title: Iron Man 3
movies.Writer: Drew Pearce (screenplay), Shane Black (screenplay), Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comic book by), Don Heck (based on the Marvel comic book by), Larry Lieber (based on the Marvel comic book by), Jack Kirby (based on the Marvel comic book by), Warren Ellis (based on the "Extremis" mini-series written by), Adi Granov (based on the "Extremis" mini-series illustrated by)
movies.Actors: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Don Cheadle, Guy Pearce
movies.Plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 53 nominations.

movies.Title: Captain America
movies.Writer: Joe Simon (characters), Jack Kirby (characters), Stephen Tolkin (story), Lawrence Block (story), Stephen Tolkin (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Matt Salinger, Ronny Cox, Ned Beatty, Darren McGavin
movies.Plot: Frozen in the ice for decades, Captain America is freed to battle against arch-criminal, The Red Skull.

movies.Title: Inception
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movies.Plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.Title: The Dark Knight
movies.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
movies.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
movies.Plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.Title: The Lord of the Rings
movies.Writer: Chris Conkling (screenplay), Peter S. Beagle (screenplay), J.R.R. Tolkien (novels)
movies.Actors: Christopher Guard, William Squire, Michael Scholes, John Hurt
movies.Plot: The Fellowship of the Ring embark on a journey to destroy the One Ring and end Sauron's reign over Middle-earth.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

movies.Title: Fight Club
movies.Actors: Edward Norton, Brad Pitt, Meat Loaf, Zach Grenier
movies.Plot: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 31 nominations.

movies.Title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.Writer: Chris Weitz (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay), John Knoll (story by), Gary Whitta (story by), George Lucas (based on characters created by)
movies.Actors: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Alan Tudyk, Donnie Yen
movies.Plot: The Rebel Alliance makes a risky move to steal the plans for the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

movies.Title: The Car
movies.Writer: Dennis Shryack (screenplay), Michael Butler (screenplay), Lane Slate (screenplay), Dennis Shryack (story), Michael Butler (story)
movies.Actors: James Brolin, Kathleen Lloyd, John Marley, R.G. Armstrong
movies.Plot: A mysterious black, sleek automobile terrorizes everyone it comes into contact with in a small town in Utah. The local sheriff may be the only person who can stop this menace which has been possessed by pure evil.

movies.Title: Hulk
movies.Writer: Stan Lee (Marvel comic book character), Jack Kirby (Marvel comic book character), James Schamus (story), John Turman (screenplay), Michael France (screenplay), James Schamus (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas
movies.Plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

movies.Title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
movies.Writer: Chris Terrio, David S. Goyer, Bob Kane (Batman created by), Bill Finger (Batman created by), Jerry Siegel (Superman created by), Joe Shuster (Superman created by)
movies.Actors: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Jesse Eisenberg
movies.Plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
